material.gtceu.hot_meta_stable_hyper_enr: Hot Meta-Stable Hyper Enriched Thorium Fuel
material.gtceu.lightly_plasmacracked_enr: Lightly Plasma-Cracked Enriched Naquadria Fuel Base
material.gtceu.lightly_plasmacracked_uns: Lightly Plasma-Cracked Unstable Enriched Thorium Fuel
material.gtceu.severly_plasmacracked_enr: Severely Plasma-Cracked Enriched Naquadria Fuel Base

basegtm.custom.tooltip_active_transforme: Dynamically adjusts power flow between voltage tiers to stabilize complex energy networks.
Can combine any number of §aEnergy Inputs§r into any number of §cEnergy Outputs§r.
Can transmit power at incredible distance with §dLasers§r!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_alloy_blast_smelt: Combines high-temperature smelting with alloy creation.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_assembly_line_1: An automated system for large-scale, sequential item assembly.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_assembly_line_2: This machine needs a special automation - be prepared!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_boilers_warning: §4Will explode if provided Fuel with no Water!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_bronze_large_boil: Generates steady steam output using heat-resistant bronze construction.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_bronze_multiblock: Stores fluids securely using bronze-reinforced walls suitable for mid-tier operations.
Fill and drain through the Controller or Tank Valves.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_central_monitor_1: Displays real-time system data across connected machines for improved operational oversight.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_charcoal_pile_ign: Ignites charcoal piles with controlled heat release to begin the slow carbonization process.
Burn the controller with a Flint and Steel to activate it.
After that wait until the controller turns off again - your Brittle Charcoal is ready!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_cleanroom_1: Maintains a controlled clean environment essential for precision fabrication.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_cleanroom_2: Place machines inside to run Cleanroom Recipes.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_cleanroom_3: Uses 30 EU/t when dirty, 4 EU/t when clean.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_cleanroom_6: Accepts up to 4 Doors - remains clean when the door is open!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_cleanroom_7: Generators, Mufflers and Primitive Machines are too dirty for the Cleanroom
basegtm.custom.tooltip_cleanroom_8: Send power through Hulls or Diodes and §aAE2 Network§r through Hulls in the Walls!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_coke_oven_1: Produces coke from coal through destructive distillation.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_cracker_1: Breaks down complex hydrocarbons into simpler compounds.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_cracker_2: Every coil after §bCupronickel§f reduces energy usage by 10%%.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_data_bank_1: Stores and organizes massive volumes of digital information for automation and research.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_data_bank_3: Data Banks can be chained together for more Data-Capacity!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_data_bank_5: Uses §a30.720 EU/t§r per §dData/Optical Hatch§r when chained!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_distillation_towe: Separates liquid mixtures into their components by boiling and condensation.
Will void fluids if it's not big enough!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_ebf_coils.0: For every §c900K§r above the recipe temperature:
basegtm.custom.tooltip_ebf_coils.1: - A multiplicative 95% §aenergy multiplier§r is applied pre-overclocking.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_ebf_coils.2: For every §c1800K§r above the recipe temperature:
basegtm.custom.tooltip_ebf_coils.3: - One overclock becomes §f100%% efficient§7 (perfect overclock - 4/4 OC).
basegtm.custom.tooltip_electric_blast_fu: Also known as EBF - a powerful electric furnace for high-temperature material processing.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_ev_bedrock_ore_mi: Excavates rare bedrock-layer materials with EV-grade precision and drilling strength.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_ev_fluid_drilling: Pumps underground fluids using enhanced extraction pressure at EV-tier performance.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_ev_large_miner_1: Recovers deep mineral deposits with improved EV-grade excavation and transport systems.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_extreme_combustio: Produces exceptional mechanical force by burning fuel under extreme compression levels.
Supply 80mb/s of §bLiquid Oxygen§f to produce up to 32.768 EU/t at 2x fuel consumption
basegtm.custom.tooltip_high_performance_: Item in, research out — stored on a Data Orb or Module.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_hv_bedrock_ore_mi: Provides reliable HV-tier extraction of rare resources directly from bedrock layers.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_hv_fluid_drilling: Extracts underground fluids using HV-grade pumps and stabilized drilling mechanisms.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_implosion_compres: Applies immense pressure to compact materials, often for explosive reactions.
The only Machine you want to go §lBOOM!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_iv_large_miner_1: Extracts ores on an industrial scale with advanced scanning and high-voltage drilling systems.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_arc_smelter: Performs high-temperature smelting of various materials.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_assembler_1: Automates the assembly of complex components and circuits.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_autoclave_1: Sterilizes, cures, and processes materials under high pressure.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_brewer_1: Handles diverse liquid processing, including brewing, fermentation, and fluid heating.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_centrifuge_: Separates mixed materials by centrifugal force, including thermal applications.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_chemical_ba: Processes items and ores using chemical solutions for cleaning and purification.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_chemical_re: Facilitates complex chemical reactions between various substances.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_circuit_ass: Specialized in the advanced assembly of electronic circuits.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_combustion_: Burns refined fuels to generate powerful mechanical energy for heavy-duty applications.
Supply 20mb/s of §bOxygen§f to produce up to 6.144 EU/t at 2x fuel consumption
Burns refined gases to generate sustained mechanical power for heavy industrial systems.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_cutter_1: Precision cutting and shaping of materials, also functions as a lathe.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_electrolyze: Splits compounds into their constituent elements using electrolysis.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_electromagn: Separates magnetic from non-magnetic materials and polarizes items.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_engraving_l: Engraves intricate patterns and marks onto materials with high precision.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_extractor_1: Can serve as a Canner for assembly (e.g., batteries) or an Extractor for material separation.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_extruder_1: Shapes items under pressure with specialized molds.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_maceration_: Crushes and grinds materials into fine powders for further processing.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_material_pr: Processes materials through bending, compression, forging, and shaping.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_miner_drill: Uses 7mb/t of §eDrilling Fluid§r, doubled per overclock.
Uses 8mb/t of §eDrilling Fluid§r, doubled per overclock.
Uses 9mb/t of §eDrilling Fluid§r, doubled per overclock.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_miner_macer: Produces 3x more Crushed Ores than a Macerator.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_miner_silk_: Has Silk Touch and Chunk Aligned Modes.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_mixer_1: Blends and mixes various ingredients, including fluids and solids.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_packer_1: Automatically packs and unpacks items into denser forms.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_sifting_fun: Filters and separates fine particles from various materials.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_solidifier_: Transforms molten or liquid materials into solid forms.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_large_wiremill_1: Draws metals into wires of various gauges.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_luv_fusion_reacto: Generates immense fusion energy through high-density plasma stabilization at LUV tier.
Will only accept §dLuV§r, §cZPM§r and §3UV§r Energy Hatches!
For every energy hatch it has, its buffer increases by §a10M EU§r.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_luv_large_miner_1: Extracts vast quantities of ore using LUV-tier power for extreme excavation efficiency.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_mega_blast_furnac: Also known as RHF - a massive electric furnace for high-volume, high-temperature smelting.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_mega_vacuum_freez: Rapidly cools large quantities of materials to ultra-low temperatures in a vacuum.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_multi_smelter_2: Electric Furnace with Coil upgrade possibility!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_mv_bedrock_ore_mi: Harvests bedrock-level resources using MV-tier stability and reinforced drilling modules.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_mv_fluid_drilling: Draws underground fluids using MV-tier extraction modules and stable drilling control.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_network_switch_1: Routes data traffic between machines, providing stable and efficient network communication.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_network_switch_2: Can combine any number of §bComputation Receivers§r into any number of §bComputation Transmitters§r.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_network_switch_3: Uses 7.680 EU/t per Computation Data Hatch.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_plasma_large_turb: Generates enormous energy by channeling superheated plasma through advanced turbine coils.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_power_substation_: The heart of your centralized power grid!
Capacitors don't need to be all the same tier.
Loses energy equal to 1% of the total capacity every 24 hours.
Capped at 100k EU/t passive loss per Capacitor Block.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_primitive_blast_f: A fundamental furnace for basic high-temperature smelting operations.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_primitive_pump_1: A basic pump for giving you free water - nice!
basegtm.custom.tooltip_pyrolyse_oven_1: Decomposes organic materials through high-temperature pyrolysis in an oxygen-free environment.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_pyrolyse_oven_2: §5Cupronickel§f coils are §b25%§f slower. Every coil after §bKanthal§f increases speed by §b50%.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_research_station_: Conducts scientific experiments and technological studies to unlock advanced progress.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_rotor_holder_1: Each Rotor Holder above §6HV§r adds 10% efficiency and multiplies EU/t by 2.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_rotor_holder_2: Each Rotor Holder above §6EV§r adds 10% efficiency and multiplies EU/t by 2.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_rotor_holder_3: Each Rotor Holder above §6IV§r adds 10% efficiency and multiplies EU/t by 2.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_steam_grinder_1: A steam-powered machine for macerating and grinding materials.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_steam_large_turbi: Converts high-pressure steam into large-scale rotational energy for power generation.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_steam_oven_1: A steam-powered oven used for smelting and cooking.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_steel_large_boile: Generates high-pressure steam with durable steel heating chambers for industrial processes.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_steel_multiblock_: Stores large volumes of fluids securely within reinforced steel containment walls.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_titanium_large_bo: Efficiently converts fuel into high-temperature steam using lightweight titanium alloys.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_tungstensteel_lar: Produces massive amounts of steam using high-temperature tungstensteel heating chambers.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_uv_fusion_reactor: Achieves ultra-high-energy fusion output through extreme plasma confinement at UV tier.
For every energy hatch it has, its buffer increases by §a40M EU§r.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_vacuum_freezer_1: Cools items to extremely low temperatures in a vacuum.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_wooden_multiblock: A simple but sturdy wooden container for storing bulk fluids at early-tier scale.
basegtm.custom.tooltip_zpm_fusion_reacto: Harnesses zero-point-powered confinement fields to fuel high-efficiency fusion reactions.
Will only accept §cZPM§r and §3UV§r Energy Hatches!
For every energy hatch it has, its buffer increases by §a20M EU§r.

gtceu.multiblock.coil_bonus: §6Cupronickel§7 coils are §r25%§7 slower. Every coil after §bKanthal§7 increases speed by §r50%§7.
gtceu.multiblock.needed_laser_output.des: Power may only be extracted by Laser Source Hatches
gtceu.opv_parallel_hatch.desc: §rAllows to run up to 262144 recipes in parallel
gtceu.uev_parallel_hatch.desc: §rAllows to run up to 4096 recipes in parallel
gtceu.uhv_parallel_hatch.desc: §rAllows to run up to 1024 recipes in parallel
gtceu.uiv_parallel_hatch.desc: §rAllows to run up to 16384 recipes in parallel
gtceu.uxv_parallel_hatch.desc: §rAllows to run up to 65536 recipes in parallel
gtmutils.custom.tooltip_pterb_machine_2: A high-efficiency machine that utilizies PTERB technology for wireless energy transfer.
gtmutils.custom.tooltip_pterb_machine_3: All WATs with the same frequency will wireless transfer energy between each other!
multiblock.laseraccess2: §7This multiblock can be powered with Laser Target Hatches.
multiblock.laseroutputaccess2: §7This multiblock can use Laser Source Hatches for outputting energy.
multiblock.needlaseraccess2: §7This multiblock MUST be powered with Laser Target Hatches.
multiblock.pchaccess2: §7This multiblock can use PCHs to increase it's efficiency.
multiblock.subtickaccess2: §7This multiblock supports subtick to go beyond 1-tick!
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_adv_processing: Integrates multiple high-tech systems to refine and process materials with advanced automation.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_altart2_1: A Blood Altar of tier 2, used for more complex Blood Magic rituals.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_altart3_1: A Blood Altar of tier 3, enabling powerful and intricate Blood Magic spells.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_altart4_1: A Blood Altar of tier 4, essential for high-level Blood Magic and advanced crafting.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_altart5_1: A Blood Altar of tier 5, capable of performing the most demanding Blood Magic operations.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_altart6_1: A Blood Altar of tier 6, the pinnacle of Blood Magic, unlocking ultimate power.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_atmospheric_co: A multi-block gas collector that can collect different gases in various dimensions.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_atomic_moonmin: An upgraded Moon Miner capable of extracting End Tungstate Ore, End Scheelite Ore, and Rutile Dust.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_atomicforge_1: Capable of various advanced syntheses, including:
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_atomicforge_2: Antimatter, various Coil Blocks, the highest tier Photovoltaic Cell VI,
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_atomicforge_3: Stabilized Collapsed Singularity, Quantum Energy Capsule and way more!
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_atomicompresso: A highly potent Compressor for specialized applications, capable of compressing various items.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_basic_fusion_i: A foundational fusion injector utilizing highly reinforced radioactive casing for core nuclear processes.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_bio_lab_1: A sophisticated laboratory for advanced biological research and synthesis.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_catalyst_react: Uses specialized catalysts to accelerate complex reactions with exceptional efficiency.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_chaotic_fusion: An ultimate Chaotic-Tier fusion injector, providing unparalleled performance for nuclear reactions with parallel processing capabilities, built with highly reinforced radioactive casing, maintenance, and muffler functionality.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_chaotic_singul: A high-tier singularity reactor capable of immense energy generation, including laser output.
Everything contained within highly reinforced radioactive casings.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_chemical_plant: A robust chemical plant for efficient batch reactions, equipped with laser integration
and parallel processing for optimal output.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_circuit_assemb: An advanced multi-block assembly line engineered for high-precision circuit manufacturing,
offering comprehensive fluid, item, energy, and data processing capabilities.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_component_asse: A sophisticated multi-block assembly line dedicated to the
precision manufacturing of complex components, featuring advanced fluid and item handling.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_cryogenic_cent: Separates materials at cryogenic temperatures using high-speed rotation.
Consumes 64x §bCrushed Ice§r per Tick while running.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_dimensional_ma: Depending on its construction location, it can also extract other resources.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_dimensional_mi: Unleash cosmic power. The Dimensional Miner effortlessly pulls Chaos, Draconium
and Awakened Draconium from other realms.
Unlock new resources: Infinity Catalyst, SpaceTime, Universium, and Stellar Matter Plasma.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_draconic_fusio: A powerful Draconic-Tier fusion injector for high-yield nuclear processes.
Highly Reinforced Radioactive Casings are needed!
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_eternity_fusio: This multiblock is the best and most efficient solution for fusion.
The ultimate Fusion Reactor not only provides significantly higher output values, but is also much faster.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_eternity_recur: Harnesses the power of recursion to amplify energy generation to unprecedented levels.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_extreme_cracki: Breaks down heavy compounds under extreme heat and pressure to yield refined outputs.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_fusion_mk5_1: The pinnacle of Fusion Technology - at least from what you've heard!
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_fusion_mk5_2: Delivering unmatched energy output and efficiency.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_gravitational_: This machine is there for one reason -
Processing various materials into Heavy Platings.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_greenhouse_1: An advanced greenhouse for accelerated plant growth and biomass production.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_arc_furn: The ultimate solution for high-temperature metallurgy.
Generates colossal arcs to melt and purify materials beyond conventional limits.
Achieves extreme temperatures for advanced alloy creation.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_assemble: Capable of fabricating highly intricate devices under immense pressure and precision.
Designed for high-throughput, advanced material fusion.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_assembly: Processes components with unparalleled speed and efficiency.
Engineered for massive-scale production of the most complex assemblies.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_bender_1: Shapes the unshapeable with immense force.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_bender_2: Bends and molds even the most rigid alloys into complex, precise geometries.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_bender_3: Ideal for crafting custom frameworks and structural components.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_cutter_1: Unleashes raw power for material division.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_cutter_2: Utilizes ultra-high-pressure jets or molecular-level lasers for flawless cuts.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_cutter_3: Handles even the most resilient materials with absolute precision.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_extruder: Exerts colossal pressure to form materials.
Forces even superalloys through precision molds for perfect profiles.
Essential for producing uniform rods, pipes, and complex custom shapes.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_laser_en: Employs focused energy beams to engrave patterns with atomic-level accuracy.
Essential for micro-circuitry and advanced component etching.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_lathe_2: Spins and precisely carves materials to exact specifications.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_lathe_3: Indispensable for crafting perfectly balanced cylindrical parts and shafts.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_mixer_1: A powerhouse for advanced material synthesis.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_mixer_2: Blends liquids and solids under extreme conditions to create novel compounds.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_mixer_3: Ensures perfect homogeneity for highly reactive or volatile mixtures.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_hyper_wiremill: Redefining the art of wire production.
Draws ultra-fine, perfectly uniform wires from any conductive material.
Crucial for high-tier circuitry and intricate wiring.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_large_bacteria: Facilitates large-scale bacterial cultivation and processing for various industrial applications.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_large_dehydrat: Removes moisture from materials at industrial rates through controlled thermal extraction.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_large_evaporat: Accelerates large-scale evaporation processes to separate fluids with enhanced thermal efficiency.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_large_high_pre: Performs chemical reactions under extreme pressure, enabling advanced material synthesis.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_large_polymeri: Forges complex polymers through controlled catalytic reactions on an industrial scale.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_large_solar_pa: A massive solar panel array designed for large-scale energy production,
incorporating specialized glass and casing for maximum efficiency.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_large_synchrot: The Large Synchrotron Switcher is a very tall, but simple multiblock that acts as a particle accelerator.
It can't overclock and will only accept one laser target hatch.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_moonminer: A specialized lunar mining machine designed for extracting extraterrestrial resources.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_naquadahreacto: The Mark 1 Naquadah Reactor, designed for substantial energy generation
Harnesses refined Naquadah reactions to generate immense and highly stable energy output.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_nebular_plasma: Primarily used for the production of various types of plasma.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_particle_implo: Collapses high-energy particles inward to induce exotic matter transformations.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_plasma_mixer_1: Combines volatile plasma streams into controlled fusion-ready mixtures.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_plasma_mixer_2: Consumes a certain pair of §bPlasmas§r per Tick while running.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_plasma_mixer_3: Each §bPlasma Pair§r after Helium & Oxygen decreases the recipe duration by 100 seconds and
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_processing_pla: Processes ores in a single step.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_processor_prin: Prints enhanced processors with optimized efficiency and expanded material compatibility.
Manufactures HV-Tier processors using advanced fabrication patterns.
Fabricates intricate processor designs with industrial-level precision.
Automates large-scale processor printing with superior structural accuracy.
Prints LV Microprocessors with basic automation and stable throughput.
Produces MV processors with improved precision and faster printing cycles.
Creates hyper-advanced processors with unparalleled fabrication quality.
Prints processors at UV-Tier complexity using extreme-precision machinery.
Mass-produces ultra-efficient processors using ZPM-optimized fabrication.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_quantum_coolin: Maintains ultralow temperatures essential for stabilizing
highly volatile quantum materials and experiments.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_quantum_entang: Deciphers and processes complex quantum entanglement signals, revealing hidden information.
Generates and encodes quantum entangled data streams for secure and instantaneous transmission.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_quantum_space_: A vastly more powerful and efficient Fusion Reactor,
simultaneously functioning as a 'Space Miner' capable of extracting numerous ores and pumping fluids.
It can also mine Cosmic Neutronium Dust and assemble Highly-Resonative SoC's.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_reinforced_ato: An enhanced version of the Atomic Forge.
Featuring all its capabilities plus an Electric Blast Furnace mode
All Atomic Melting Module recipes will use §b200mb/t§r of §6Kerosene-Based Heating Fluid.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_robust_extract: A multi-block extractinator that can produce some useful stuff for you!
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_singularity_da: A highly advanced processing unit that refines and transforms exotic materials,
leveraging the power of singularity data to yield powerful liquids and complex plasmas.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_starcondenser_: Generates Liquified Condensed Star Matter using only energy.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_starextractor_: Uses a non-consumed catalyst and Drilling Fluid to produce a little bit of Star Matter for you!
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_stasis_phase_s: Manipulates temporal and spatial phases to induce stasis or accelerate specific processes.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_superconductiv: Generates a powerful superconductive stasis field,
capable of halting or significantly slowing objects within its influence.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_supercriticalv: A powerful supercritical vibration sifter that leverages a particle generator and neutronium casing for highly efficient material separation in batch mode.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_tectonic_plate: Simulates immense geological forces to compress, alter, and evolve raw materials.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_tesla_tower_1: An energy producer with various inputs (Tesla Coils) that outputs different types of energy.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_uev_fusion_rea: Unleashes ultra-energetic fusion power by stabilizing high-density plasma fields.
For every energy hatch it has, its buffer increases by §a160M EU§r.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_wyvern_fusion_: An advanced Wyvern-Tier fusion injector, offering enhanced performance for nuclear reactions.
It requires highly reinforced radioactive casings so be careful!
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_xl_plasma_turb: A powerful turbine - you'll need a few of them!
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_xl_radiation_c: Bathes materials in intensified radiation fields for transformation or purification.
steamadditions.custom.tooltip_steam_foun: Uses pressurized steam to melt and cast metals with steady, heat-rich output.
steamadditions.custom.tooltip_steam_sepa: Uses pressurized steam to centrifuge solid materials, separating items into their refined components.
skyofgrind.custom.tooltip_eternity_recur: Simulates the life of the universe from beginning to end, over and over and over and over again... to capture an infintesimally small fraction of eternity.
skyofgrind.custom.laser_beam_containment: Transforming pure laser energy into concentrated laser flow of §4R§aG§1B§r spectrum
Can precisely emit laser into objects or capture laser flow into laser flux capsules
Requires 18 laser emitters(6 §4Red§r, 6 §aGreen§r and 6 §1Blue§r) to operate
Laser emitters will occasionally break from excessive power
skyofgrind.custom.laser_synchronizer_chi: Cooling materials under extreme conditions by using concentrated laser flow
Merge three laser flux into one while consuming exotic plasmas and liquids
Requires 3 laser flux capsules(§4Red§r, §aGreen§r and §1Blue§r) to operate
Laser flux capsules can operate for long time but they eventually drain all of their energy
skyofgrind.custom.orbital_bore_1: The Ultimate Solution for your Fluid and Ore needs!
skyofgrind.custom.orbital_bore_2: You'll unlock more recipes the further you go - have a look at the non-consumables!
skyofgrind.custom.solar_alloy_forge_1: Using the power of the §1§6SUN§r to get access to better recipes!
skyofgrind.custom.solar_alloy_forge_2: You can get Solar-Eclipse Alloy before this - but you definetely will love this Multiblock!
skyofgrind.custom.hyper_bio_lab: A highly advanced bio-laboratory that can process complex biological materials at an unprecedented scale.
